name: SoftSide Adventure of the Month 13: Arrow One
overview: Arrow One is the thirteenth in series of monthly text adventures for multiple systems. It's been 3 years now, 3 years since your mission into deep space. Your name is Adam Trent, explorer, trouble-shooter, and all around good guy for the Federation of Space. Your journey aboard Arrow One has come to an end: an uncharted planet the council asked you to explore. Slowly you descend onto this strange new world. All commands are via 2-word VERB NOUN entries, and game play contains several object puzzles. There is no save and restore feature.
